scripts.export-db: cd studio && SANITY_AUTH_TOKEN=$SANITY_DEPLOY_STUDIO_TOKEN sanity dataset export production ./production.tar.gz
scripts.import-db: cd studio && SANITY_AUTH_TOKEN=$SANITY_DEPLOY_STUDIO_TOKEN sanity dataset import ./production.tar.gz dev --replace
scripts.clone: sanity dataset export production production && sanity dataset import production/production.tar.gz development --replace
